mapper.insert: INSERT INTO offers (name, category, description, creationdate, status, modificationdate) VALUES( #{oferta.name}, #{categoryId}, #{oferta.description}, #{oferta.creationDate}, #{oferta.status}, #{oferta.modification});
mapper.select: SELECT id, name, category, description, creationdate, status, modificationdate, FROM offers WHERE offers.usuario = #{usuario};
mapper.update: UPDATE Offers SET status=#{status}, modificationdate = CURRENT_DATE WHERE id = #{id};
